title: 2.59 The Fates of the Apostles
itunes:title: The Fates of the Apostles
description: Of all the apostles, the New Testament only describes the fate of James the Just. For all the others, we have only stories written decades or even centuries after the deaths. I also discuss the letters 1st Peter, James, and Jude.
content:encoded: Of all the apostles, the New Testament only describes the fate of James the Just. For all the others, we have only stories written decades or even centuries after the deaths. I also discuss the letters 1st Peter, James, and Jude.
itunes:subtitle: What happened to those who knew Jesus personally, the disciples and James the Just? With the exception of James the Just, the New Testament is silent. We only have stories made up decades or centuries later.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
